titleStmt.title: Answers for the free-men fleshers of Edinburgh to the petition presented to His Majesties high commissioner, and the honourable estates of Parliament by Alexander Milne and VVilliam Lauson, Andrew Brown, Archibald Douglass, Janet Carse relict of umquhile, Thomas VVright, fleshers of the said burgh, against them.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages creased with slight loss of print.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
